results.content: WP was a complete mystery to me before taking the WordPress Security course.  Rob's easy, informative manor and good pace allowed me to soak in the content well.  I took notes and review the course from time to time to stay reminded of the necessary security steps.  I wonder why WP doesn't set up the installation with many of the suggestions Rob presents here - no wonder sites get hacked.

I took notes and review the course from time to time to stay reminded of the necessary security steps. I wonder why WP doesn't set up the installation with many of the suggestions Rob presents here - no wonder sites get hacked.

results.content: Some good resources that I didn't know about but other content was more entry level for my experience.
results.content_html: Some good resources that I didn't know about but other content was more entry level for my experience.

results.content: Web security is an important topic, that shouldn't be ignored.  Rob Cubbon has an easy conversational style, that is easy to understand, entertaining, and helpful!  Make sure you follow along & make the changes Rob suggests while completing this course.  I had my Wordpress website open in a separate tab, to make the changes he suggests right after it was shown in the video so I could follow his steps.  His step by step instructions are easy to follow regardless of your experience with Wordpress and each change worked flawlessly!  I highly recommend this course if you have a Wordpress based website!
results.content_html: Web security is an important topic, that shouldn't be ignored. Rob Cubbon has an easy conversational style, that is easy to understand, entertaining, and helpful! Make sure you follow along & make the changes Rob suggests while completing this course. I had my Wordpress website open in a separate tab, to make the changes he suggests right after it was shown in the video so I could follow his steps. His step by step instructions are easy to follow regardless of your experience with Wordpress and each change worked flawlessly! I highly recommend this course if you have a Wordpress based website!

results.content: Rob is an extra ordinary WP Security rockstar! He was "to the point" throughout the course outline - no unnecessary talk - and explained various ways of getting things done. Not just one way. Multiple ways. I was overloaded with info online on hardening WP security due to different techniques, but the ones he illustrated do the job nicely. He made everything look SO easy and straight. One thing that could have been added to harden security even further would be showing how to change "table prefix" for the database because most hosts setup the Wordpress by default to "wp_". It's very common to get stuck with it. All in all, I rate this course 5 star! Anyone who's looking to ace WP security should take this course and save several days, if not weeks, learning the right ways to secure your Wordpress site. Cheers.

results.content: Rob takes you on a tour of the steps you need to take to quickly secure your Wordpress website. He is quick and gives you what he uses and gives you that since of urgency to get it done, as he will explain to you what will happen if you do not protect your site, as it happened to him.

results.content: He takes us through all the things we need to do to keep our site clean and how to set up WordFence. I had done a lot of what Rob suggests but now finished the job.

results.content:
I really enjoyed this course. I bought two courses on the topic and both of them together gave me a full picture. They overlapped a lot, but that's expected. They used different approaches to solving same problems. For example, in this course you'll see the author explains how to stop frontend php error reporting by editing wp-config file. In the other course the author uses .htaccess to do the same thing. It confused me a little - I guess, that's the price you pay when you get more than one course on the subject. But I think, it's just two ways to solve a problem.
This course really got into detail about Wordfence and I appreciate this very much. 
Overall, I recommend this course to any new WP developer or site owner.
results.content_html:

Overall, I recommend this course to any new WP developer or site owner.
